How to run the examples within this project

== Introduction ==

Download the graydonCompanyDataWebservices_Examples.jar
Download the latest version of Apache Axis http://ws.apache.org/axis/

== Details ==

1. Make sure the Apache Axis .jars and the graydonCompanyDataWebservices_Examples.jar are in your classpath.

||set AXIS_LIB=(Axis jars Path)||
||set GRAYDON_LIB=(Graydon Client jars Path)||
||SET CLASSPATH=%AXIS_LIB%\axis.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\commons-discovery-0.2.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\commons-logging-1.0.4.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\jaxrpc.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\saaj.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\log4j-1.2.8.jar;%AXIS_LIB%\wsdl4j-1.5.1.jar;%GRAYDON_LIB%\graydonCompanyDataWebservices_Examples.jar||

2. Go to a command line and run one of the examples _(Note: you may need to set the http.proxyHost and http.proxyPort setting)_

||*java* uk.co.graydon.GraydonDataService.examples.CompanyMatchByName "<userId>" "<password>" "United Kingdom" "IBM"||
||*java* uk.co.graydon.GraydonDataService.examples.CompanyMatchByIdentifier "<userId>" "<password>" "United Kingdom" "01777777"||
||*java* uk.co.graydon.GraydonDataService.examples.CompanyMatchByKeyword "<userId>" "<password>" "United Kingdom" "IBM" "London"||
||*java* uk.co.graydon.GraydonDataService.examples.CompanyMatchByPostCode "<userId>" "<password>" "United Kingdom" "W5 1DB"||
